title: John McAfee
body:
IP Objective: John McAfee
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 5000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 20000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01  18:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.03    00:30

Yes, he’s the same guy who pioneered the renowned cybersecurity software, the McAfee Antivirus. John McAfee has since ventured into crypto territory and has taken to Twitter to impart his analysis on the crypto industry and its host of developments. On the social media platform, where he has 1 million followers, you can find his updates and commentaries on many different subjects, including crypto. He occasionally posts bits of worldly wisdom, as well as some humorous commentary.
author: 0x9c32555C64879004AC20a2192557eC48a2e4b807
